attributes.action: Call a referendum, to leave ECHR.
attributes.additional_details: The ECHR, has been misinterpreted and abused.
attributes.background: I want the Government or Parliament to let the people of the United kingdom have the choice of remaining or leaving the ECHR.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730293
